title: Bloomberg Markets: Northwestern President on `Most Selective'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Northwestern President on `Most Selective'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Morton Schapiro\u0010President\u0010Northwestern University\u0010Discussing whether students should attend the most selective college that admits them with Bloomberg News Higher Education Reporter Janet Lorin.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
